title: Self Roles
desc: Really cool roles that you should totally pick up. Most of these can be pinged by staff via Faye, so if you *really* wanna avoid pings, then maybe don't pick up anything from here. Sorry, introverts!

roles.name: LGBTQIA+
roles.description: Members of the LGBTQIA+ community. Cannot be pinged under any circumstance.

roles.name: Group Commentators
roles.description: People who want to join on group commentary. Can be pinged by staff via Faye.

roles.name: Content Pings
roles.description: Get notified when Autumn starts streaming or uploads a video! Can be pinged by staff via Faye.

roles.name: Project Pings
roles.description: Get notified when one of Autumn's projects gets updated! Can be pinged by staff via Faye.

roles.name: I Like Pings
roles.description: Freely pingable role that anyone can use when they want to talk to someone.

roles.name: Neurodivergent
roles.description: Role for those who have neurological conditions such as autism, ADHD, OCD, etc.

roles.name: Autistic
roles.description: Those who are diagnosed anywhere on the autism spectrum.

roles.name: OSDD/DID System
roles.description: Those who are part of an OSDD/DID system.
